data.title: List Of Movies Shah Rukh Khan And Salman Khan Starred Together After Karan Arjun
meta_keywords: All the times SRK & Salman played cameo in each other’s films
List of movies SRK and Salman did together
data.meta_description: Two of the biggest superstars of Bollywood, Salman Khan and Shah Rukh Khan, have worked together in several movies after the famous film ‘Karan Arjun’. Some of these movies include ‘Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam’ and ‘Kuch Kuch Hota Hai’
data.text:
‘Karan Arjun’

‘Karan Arjun’, which was released in 1995, marked the first time Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan shared screen space. They played brothers in the movie.

‘Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam’

This film revolves around how Gopal (SRK) misunderstood the platonic friendship between his wife Radha (Madhuri Dixit) and Suraj (Salman Khan).

‘Kuch Kuch Hota Hai’

Salman made a special appearance in the later half of ‘Kuch Kuch Hota Hai’. He played Aman who was set to marry Kajol’s character Anjali.

‘Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega’

SRK also made a cameo in Salman and Preity Zinta’s ‘Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega’. He was seen in the title song’s music video.

‘Om Shanti Om’

Salman made a guest appearance in the party song ‘Deewangi Deewangi’ in SRK and Deepika Padukone’s ‘Om Shanti Om’.

‘Tubelight’

SRK appeared as Magician Gogo Pasha in Salman’s ‘Tubelight’, which was released in 2017.

‘Zero’

Salman and SRK grooving in the music video 'Issaqbaazi' of ‘Zero’ grabbed several eyeballs.
